DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to pilot a relapse questionnaire and examine relapse patterns in female cocaine users.
DOC.brief_title: Relapse Patterns in Female Cocaine Users - 4
DOC.detailed_description: The objectives of this study were to determine the most important antecedent factors in relapse episodes and difference in the use of coping skills between relapses and "close calls"
DOC.criteria: Female, cocaine abuse or dependency by SCIS, at least 7 days of current abstinence, cocaine use of 8 out of 30 days prior to current abstinence, ages 1860. Inability to participate in a 90 day longitudinal study
